content.stimulus_en: It is 0 degrees. It is very ________. (frío)

content.prompt_es: Weather forecast: 'Cloudy with rain.' - You take:
It is hot in the Sahara Desert.

content.text: It is very windy this morning.

content.prompt_es: En Madrid, la gente está en...
content.stimulus_en: People are in the park in Madrid. They walk and talk. Children play with a ball. Some people sit on benches. They eat ice cream and enjoy the sun. Birds sing in the trees. It is a happy day in the park.

content.prompt_es: Escucha y escribe lo que oyes:
content.stimulus_en: It is sunny and hot today.
content.correct_answer: It is sunny and hot today.

content.prompt_es: Escucha y escribe lo que oyes:

content.correct_answer: Take your umbrella, it is raining.

content.correct_answer: The weather is cloudy and cool.

content.correct_answer: It is very windy in the afternoon.

content.correct_answer: The forecast says it is going to rain.

content.title: Pronunciación: Snow
content.instructions: Escucha y repite el grupo consonántico 'sn'.

questions.prompt_es: ¿Se añade una 'e' antes de la 's' en 'snow'?

options.text: No, se empieza directamente con el silbido de la 's'
